column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Dislike: their tight parking
column2: I've had to park 2 streets down. The one time I got to park in the parking lot
column3: I had trouble getting out because 3 cars were waiting for my spot! I guess my advice is don't go at their busiest times
column4: weekends and lunch times are surely packed
column5: or go early! But this is a sign that Common Bond is great!
